requirement_tested: A frontend that fetches all data from backend APIs
user_persona: A traveler exploring Europe who wants up-to-date information on campsites and attractions.
user_goal: To view the latest featured campsites without seeing any hardcoded or stale data.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Maria opens the travel website homepage to see featured campsites.
narrative_steps.action: Load the homepage URL in browser.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The frontend makes an API call to /api/featured/campsites and displays dynamically fetched campsite data in the carousel.

requirement_tested: A backend that connects to an external PostgreSQL database using these exact environment variables: DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp
user_persona: A developer deploying the backend service for the first time.
user_goal: To ensure the backend successfully connects to the PostgreSQL database using the specified environment variables.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Service
narrative_steps.description: The developer starts the backend server after setting the required environment variables.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm start` in the backend directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The backend logs show a successful connection to the PostgreSQL database using host=localhost, port=5432, username=myappuser, password=myapppassword, and database=myapp.

requirement_tested: Configure the repository's package.json so that npm run install:all installs both FE & BE
user_persona: A new contributor setting up the project locally.
user_goal: To quickly install dependencies for both frontend and backend with a single command.

narrative_steps.title: Installing Dependencies
narrative_steps.description: Alex clones the repository and runs the install-all script to get started.
narrative_steps.action: Execute `npm run install:all` from the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend directories have their respective node_modules installed, as indicated by console messages confirming installation completion.

requirement_tested: Configure the repository's package.json so that npm run dev starts both concurrently
user_persona: A developer ready to begin working on feature development.
user_goal: To launch both frontend and backend servers simultaneously for integrated development.

narrative_steps.title: Launching Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: Jamie wants to work on both frontend and backend together and uses the dev script.
narrative_steps.action: Execute `npm run dev` from the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend development server (e.g., React/Vue dev server) and backend Node.js server start concurrently, with output from both visible in the terminal.

requirement_tested: A homepage showcasing featured tourist attractions and campsites across Europe
user_persona: A casual visitor interested in planning a European trip.
user_goal: To discover featured attractions and campsites right from the homepage.

narrative_steps.title: Landing on Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Taylor visits the travel site homepage hoping to find inspiration for her next trip.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the homepage URL.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The homepage loads with a hero banner, navigation bar, and two horizontally scrollable carouselsâ€”one displaying featured attractions and another for featured campsites.

narrative_steps.title: Exploring Featured Content
narrative_steps.description: Intrigued by a campsite image, Taylor clicks on it to learn more.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a campsite item in the featured campsites carousel.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The page navigates to the detailed view page for that specific campsite.

requirement_tested: A search functionality allowing users to filter attractions and campsites by country, city, or keyword
user_persona: A meticulous planner looking for specific destinations.
user_goal: To find campsites located specifically in Berlin, Germany.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Search Interface
narrative_steps.description: Jordan looks for the search bar to narrow down his options.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Search' link in the main navigation.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The search interface appears with dropdowns for country and city, a keyword input field, and filter/reset buttons.

narrative_steps.title: Filtering Results
narrative_steps.description: He selects Germany from the country dropdown, waits for the city list to populate, then chooses Berlin.
narrative_steps.action: Select 'Germany' from the country dropdown. Then select 'Berlin' from the city dropdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: City dropdown populates dynamically with German cities. Selecting Berlin updates the available results to only show campsites in Berlin.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Filters
narrative_steps.description: Satisfied with his selections, Jordan applies the filters.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Apply Filters' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Results area updates to display only campsites located in Berlin, Germany.

requirement_tested: A detailed view page for each attraction and campsite displaying description, location, images, availability, and reviews
user_persona: A cautious booker wanting thorough information before making a reservation.
user_goal: To evaluate whether a particular campsite meets his family's needs.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Campsite Details
narrative_steps.description: Riley has clicked on a campsite and now sees its dedicated page.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to a specific campsite's detail page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Page displays title, description, image gallery, embedded map, availability calendar, reviews section, and action buttons ('Book Now', 'Write Review').

narrative_steps.title: Checking Availability
narrative_steps.description: He wants to know if the campsite is free during his planned vacation week.
narrative_steps.action: Inspect the availability calendar for certain dates.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Calendar highlights available and unavailable dates clearly, helping Riley identify open slots.

requirement_tested: A booking system enabling users to reserve attractions and campsites with date selection and confirmation
user_persona: A spontaneous traveler ready to lock in a booking immediately.
user_goal: To successfully reserve a weekend stay at a campsite he just discovered.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Booking
narrative_steps.description: Casey finds a perfect lakeside campsite and decides to book it right away.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Book Now' button on the campsite detail page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A booking modal/form opens, prompting Casey to select dates and specify guest count.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting Dates
narrative_steps.description: He picks Friday through Sunday for his getaway.
narrative_steps.action: Click on available dates in the date picker to select the desired range.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Selected dates are highlighted, and pricing information updates accordingly.

narrative_steps.title: Confirming Reservation
narrative_steps.description: After verifying everything, Casey confirms his booking.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Submit Booking' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Data is sent to /api/bookings/create, and a confirmation modal appears with booking details.

requirement_tested: A user review system allowing visitors to submit ratings and written feedback for attractions and campsites they have visited
user_persona: A responsible reviewer who likes sharing honest opinions about places he's stayed.
user_goal: To leave a five-star review with positive comments about a recently visited campsite.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Review Submission
narrative_steps.description: Dana returns to the campsite page where she spent last weekend and wants to share her experience.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Write Review' button on the campsite detail page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A review form appears containing star rating selector and a text area for written feedback.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Feedback
narrative_steps.description: She gives five stars and writes how clean and scenic the place was.
narrative_steps.action: Click five stars in the rating component. Type feedback into the text area. Click 'Submit Review'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Form data is posted to /api/reviews/create, and the reviews section refreshes to include Dana's new review.

requirement_tested: A user authentication system supporting registration, login, and session management
user_persona: A new user wanting to save preferences and track bookings.
user_goal: To register for an account and log in to access personalized features.

narrative_steps.title: Registering New Account
narrative_steps.description: Eli wants to keep track of future bookings and favorites, so he signs up.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Sign Up', fill out username, email, and password fields, then click 'Register'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Registration request is sent to /api/auth/register. Upon success, Eli is automatically logged in and redirected to the dashboard.

narrative_steps.title: Logging Back In
narrative_steps.description: Days later, Eli returns to the site and logs in with his credentials.
narrative_steps.action: Click 'Login', enter email/password, and click 'Login'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Request goes to /api/auth/login. Successful validation creates a session, and Eli is taken to his dashboard.

requirement_tested: A user dashboard displaying their bookings, submitted reviews, and saved favorites
user_persona: An organized traveler who keeps tabs on past and upcoming trips.
user_goal: To check his upcoming reservations and previously reviewed campsites.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Dashboard
narrative_steps.description: Owen logs in and navigates to his personal dashboard.
narrative_steps.action: Log in and go to the '/dashboard' route.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dashboard page loads showing sections for upcoming bookings, submitted reviews, and saved favorites.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Information
narrative_steps.description: He scans his upcoming bookings and clicks on one to manage it.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a booking listed under 'Upcoming Bookings'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the detailed view page for that booked campsite.

requirement_tested: A map interface visualizing the locations of attractions and campsites across European countries and cities
user_persona: A visual explorer preferring to plan trips based on geography.
user_goal: To locate nearby campsites around Lake Geneva using the interactive map.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Map View
narrative_steps.description: Nina wants to visualize campsites near Lake Geneva instead of browsing lists.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Map' tab/link in the navigation.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Interactive map fills the screen, showing clusters of markers representing attractions and campsites.

narrative_steps.title: Zooming and Exploring
narrative_steps.description: She zooms in on Switzerland and clicks a cluster to see individual sites.
narrative_steps.action: Use zoom controls to focus on Switzerland. Click a marker cluster near Lake Geneva.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Cluster expands into individual markers. Clicking a marker shows a tooltip with basic info and a link to the detail page.

requirement_tested: Admin capabilities for managing content such as adding, editing, or removing attractions and campsites
user_persona: A content manager tasked with updating listings regularly.
user_goal: To add a newly opened campsite in France to the platform.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Admin Panel
narrative_steps.description: As an admin, Morgan accesses the protected content management section.
narrative_steps.action: Log in with admin credentials and navigate to the admin dashboard.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Admin panel loads with CRUD components for managing attractions and campsites.

narrative_steps.title: Creating New Listing
narrative_steps.description: Morgan fills out the form with details for a new French campsite.
narrative_steps.action: Fill out the campsite creation form and click 'Submit'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Data is posted to /api/admin/content/create, and the new campsite appears in the listings after refresh.

requirement_tested: Responsive design optimized for desktop, tablet, and mobile browsing experiences
user_persona: A frequent traveler checking the site on various devices.
user_goal: To seamlessly use the search function whether on phone, tablet, or laptop.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Mobile Responsiveness
narrative_steps.description: Quinn checks the site on her smartphone while commuting.
narrative_steps.action: Resize browser window to less than 768px width or open on a mobile device.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout adapts: navigation collapses into hamburger menu, font sizes increase, and touch targets become larger for easier tapping.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Desktop Experience
narrative_steps.description: Later at home, Quinn switches to desktop to plan extensively.
narrative_steps.action: Expand browser window beyond 1024px width.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout shifts to multi-column grid, revealing full navigation bar and expanded content presentation suited for larger screens.

requirement_tested: UI styled with light pink as the main background color and medium violet red for interactive controls
user_persona: A brand-conscious designer validating visual consistency.
user_goal: To confirm that all interactive elements follow the prescribed color scheme.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Visual Design
narrative_steps.description: Pat inspects the homepage to verify correct usage of theme colors.
narrative_steps.action: Open homepage and inspect CSS styles applied to background and buttons.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Body background is set to #FFB6C1 (light pink). Buttons and links use #C71585 (medium violet red) for text/color/border.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Interactive States
narrative_steps.description: Pat hovers over a button to ensure hover/focus states match the theme.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over a primary button and tab-focus onto it.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Button darkens slightly or gains a themed outline/shadow when hovered or focused, maintaining color consistency.
